page.title: 06INDUSTRY in WADESMILL
page.content: Barwick Commercials was started about ten years ago and is divided into two parts.One side deals with the servicing of commercial vehicles and the other with the recovery of broken down vehicles. The servicing side depends on regular customers who come from an area within a 10 to 15 mile radius. The company deals with any make of commercial vehicle and they have noticed a trend towards buying the foreign makes of Scania and Volvo. This poses no problem as far as servicing is concerned but there can be delays when spares are not available. It is still advisable to buy British.As there is a gravel extracting industry in the area there is some work in servicing concrete mixers and tippers. There is sufficient work to keep four men employed. A fifth person under the
